body:
Hey everyone,

I tried to post this in "Ask the Seniors," but I do  not have permission to post in that category (might be a glitch or something).

To the request, can you guys make a new Promotions/Demotions thread in one of the Staff only categories? I just feel special when I occassionaly come on and see alerts, but it turns out I'm not :(    No rush

Thank you, 
Max

title: Quick Request (For Senior Staff)
